title: [Gameplay] Elementalist Lux Bug - Being able to choose the same element twice.
body:
So during a game, I had noticed that I was able to choose the same element twice in a row. At first I thought I was tripping. I decided to test this in a custom game with bots to see if it was just my eyes messing with me, there is a bug, or its intentional and I am just that slow. 


Anywho, in this instance, choosing Fire twice has Lux going into Nature Form. It is as if the game forgot that you already transformed once. 

http://i.imgur.com/mUuKrax.jpg

replies.body:
Hello, hello! 

Thanks for the report! This is an issue with the HUD (something was changed internally accidentally. D:) This'll be fixed up in the next patch. :)
